summary: Romances end in blood and the frail hopes of individuals are torn apart in a vile karmic continuity of colonialism, civil war and occupation. After surviving Japanese colonization, Korea ... See full summary »
cast: Dong-kun Yang|Min-jung Ban|Kim Young-Min|Pang Eun-Jin|Gye-nam Myeong|In-ok Lee|Jae-Hyun Cho|Yeong-im Kim|Nam-hee Kwon|Mitch Malem
title: Domicilio desconocido
